alert.note: Alert for Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 15 at 9:58PM CST until November 16 at 4:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW EXPECTED IN FAR NORTHEAST AND EAST CENTRAL WISCONSIN... .Lake effect snow showers will bring significant accumulations to much of far northeast and east central Wisconsin tonight into early Wednesday. The heaviest snows will occur in southern Marinette and southern Oconto counties tonight. Motorists should anticipate hazardous travel conditions, with reduced visibility and snow covered roads. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Snow will mix with rain at times near the bayshore, so accumulations will be lower there. * WHERE...Southern Marinette and Southern Oconto counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Poor visibility and slippery road conditions will result in hazardous travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
